features.title: Arctic Adventure
features.description: Explore the frozen world of Antarctica with your penguin character, jumping across ice platforms and avoiding obstacles.

features.title: Dynamic Levels
features.description: Experience unique challenges in each level with different ice formations, obstacles, and environmental hazards.

features.title: Power-ups
features.description: Collect special items to gain temporary abilities like double jump, ice shield, or speed boost.

features.title: Character Progression
features.description: Unlock new penguin characters with unique abilities and customize their appearance.

features.title: Achievement System
features.description: Complete challenges and earn achievements to unlock special rewards and bragging rights.

features.title: Leaderboards
features.description: Compete with players worldwide and climb the global leaderboards with your high scores.

features.title: Daily Challenges
features.description: Take on new daily challenges with unique objectives and rewards.
